verses.roman:
mahā-nṛtya, mahā-prema, mahā-saṅkīrtana
dekhi' premāveśe bhāse nīlācala-jana

synonyms: mahā-nṛtya—great dancing; mahā-prema—great love; mahā-saṅkīrtana—great congregational chanting; dekhi'—seeing; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; bhāse—float; nīlācala-jana—all the residents of Jagannātha Purī.
translation: Upon seeing the great dancing, great love and great saṅkīrtana, all the people of Jagannātha Purī floated in an ecstatic ocean of love.
